data.author: htan@insider.com (Huileng Tan)
data.title: 'Big Short' investor Michael Burry warned early about subprime excess — now he's betting on Fannie and Freddie IPOs
data.description: The Trump administration has signaled interest in releasing Fannie Mae and Freddie Mac from conservatorship.
data.content:
"Big Short" investor Michael Burry sounded early alarms about the subprime mortgage market's excesses the same risks that later engulfed mortgage giants Fannie Mae and Freddie Mac.
Now, Burry wrote … [+1798 chars]
